titleStmt.title: The possibility and necessity of the inward immediate revelation of the spirit of God towards the foundation and ground of true faith, proved in a letter write [sic] in Latine, to a person of quality in Holland; and now also put into English. By R.B.
titleStmt.author: Barclay, Robert, 1648-1690.

titleStmt.title: The possibility and necessity of the inward immediate revelation of the spirit of God towards the foundation and ground of true faith, proved in a letter write [sic] in Latine, to a person of quality in Holland; and now also put into English. By R.B.
titleStmt.author: Barclay, Robert, 1648-1690.

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" and letter signed: R. Barclay.
Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1881 as Wing B732B.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
